name: Camry
description: The Toyota Camry is a mid-size sedan known for its reliability, comfort, and fuel efficiency. It offers a spacious interior, smooth ride, and a range of features and options. The Camry is often praised for its strong performance, advanced safety technologies, and excellent resale value. It is a popular choice among families and commuters seeking a practical and dependable vehicle.

name: Ford Mustang
description: The Ford Mustang is an iconic sports car known for its powerful performance and classic design. It features a sleek and muscular exterior with a range of engine options that deliver impressive horsepower and torque. The Mustang offers a thrilling driving experience combining speed agility and precision handling. It has a rich history dating back to the 1960s and continues to be a symbol of American automotive heritage.

name: A3 Super Car
description: the A3 offers a driver-focused layout with intuitive controls and a user-friendly infotainment system. It typically includes features such as a touchscreen display, smartphone integration, Bluetooth connectivity, and advanced safety systems like lane departure warning and automatic emergency braking

name: Ford F-150
description: The Ford F-150 is a popular full-size pickup truck that is known for its durability, versatility, and capability. It offers a robust and rugged design, making it suitable for both work and everyday use. The F-150 is available with various engine options, including powerful V6 and V8 engines, providing excellent towing and hauling capabilities

name: A4 Super Car
description: The Audi A4 is a compact luxury sedan that embodies elegance, performance, and advanced technology. It showcases a refined exterior design with clean lines and a distinctive front grille, giving it a sophisticated and sporty appearance.

name: Corolla
description: The Toyota Corolla is a compact sedan that is highly regarded for its affordability, reliability, and fuel efficiency. It offers a comfortable ride, user-friendly features, and a practical interior with ample passenger and cargo space

name: Ford Explore
description: The Ford Explorer is a mid-size SUV that combines comfort, versatility, and performance. It features a stylish and modern design, with a spacious interior that can accommodate up to seven passengers.

name: A5 Super Car
description: The Audi A5 is a sleek and stylish luxury coupe that offers a blend of performance, elegance, and advanced features. It boasts a distinctive design characterized by flowing lines, a sculpted body, and a bold front grille.

name: Prius
description: The Toyota Prius is a hybrid electric vehicle (HEV) that has gained popularity for its exceptional fuel efficiency and eco-friendly features. It is known for its distinctive aerodynamic design and advanced hybrid technology

name: Ford Escape
description: The Ford Escape is a compact SUV that offers a blend of practicality, efficiency, and versatility. It features a sleek and aerodynamic design, with a comfortable interior that can accommodate both passengers and cargo.

name: Q3 Super Car
description: The Audi Q3 is a compact luxury SUV that combines versatility, style, and advanced technology. It features a sleek and modern design, with a bold front grille, sculpted lines, and distinctive LED headlights.

name: Highlander
description: The Toyota Highlander is a mid-size SUV that offers a versatile and spacious interior along with a comfortable and smooth ride. It is known for its reliability, family-friendly features, and strong performance
